Key Match Events: Bam Adebayo scored 32 points, including 20 in the first half, and had 14 rebounds.
Bilal Coulibaly led Washington with 22 points.
Jordan Poole added 21 points for Washington.
Alexandre Sarr had 17 points for Washington.
Tyler Herro scored five points in a 13-3 run in the second quarter that put the Heat ahead 51-34.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Mexico City as part of the 14th NBA regular-season game in Mexico.
NBA Commissioner Adam Silver announced an agreement to play more games in Mexico.
Bam Adebayo is 11 double-doubles away from tying Alonzo Mourning for the second-best in franchise history.
Bilal Coulibaly has scored at least 15 points in a career-best four-game span.
